categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: A battle on the planet Colla IV was a major engagement in the New Republic liberation campaign after the Battle of Endor.

A large New Republic fleet went from Kashyyyk and defeated Warlord Teradoc in the Togoria system. After this costly victory, the New Republic forces attacked the fortress world Colla IV. The battle was a major victory for the New Republic. This battle allowed the New Republic to return to Brentaal, in the Core Worlds. The Imperial abandoned the Chazwa system due to the progress of the New Republic forces.
